Platinum

Platinum

Name: Platinum

Formula: Pt

Atomic Number: 78

Group: 10

Block: d

Relative Atomic Mass: 195.084

Discovery Date: 1750

Appearance: A shiny, silvery-white metal.

Uses:

  • Jewellery
  • Catalytic Converters
  • Soldering
